results.title: The Indian Diabetes Prevention Programme shows that lifestyle modification and metformin prevent type 2 diabetes in Asian Indian subjects with impaired glucose tolerance (IDPP-1).
results.text_hl: The Indian @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@Diabetes@@@ Prevention Programme shows that lifestyle modification and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ prevent @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ in Asian Indian subjects with @DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@impaired glucose tolerance@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Renal_cell_carcinoma_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C538557 @@@IDPP-1@@@).
